name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: [SOUND] Hello

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: welcome to the course in Text Retrieval and Search Engines.

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: I'm Cheng Xiang Zhai.

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: I have a nickname Cheng.

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: I'm a professor of the Department of Computer Science at

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: this first lecture is a basic introduction to the course.

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: A brief introduction to what we we'll cover in the course.

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: We're going to first talk about the data mining specialization since this course is

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: part of that specialization.

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: And then we'll cover motivation objectives of the course.

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: This will be followed by pre-requisites and course format and reference books.

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: _And then finally we'll talk about the course schedule

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: which has number of topics to be covered in the rest of this course.

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: So the data mining specialization offered by the University of Illinois

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: at Urbana-Champaign is really to address the need for data mining techniques to

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: _handle a lot of big data
column6: to turn the big data into knowledge. _

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: _There are five lecture-based courses
column6: as you see on the slide. _

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: _Plus one capstone

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: _I'm teaching two of them which is this course

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: Search Engines and this one.

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: So the two courses that I cover here are all about the text data.

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: _In contrast
column6: the other courses are covering more general techniques that can _

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: be applied to all kinds of data.

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: So Patent Discovery taught by the Professor Jowi Han and Cluster Analysis

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: again taught by him about the general data mining techniques to handle structure.

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: The end and structure text data.

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: _And data mine
column6: data visualization covered by professor Jung Hart is about _

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: the general visualization techniques.

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: Again applicable to all kinds of data.

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: So the motivation for this course.

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: In fact also for

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: the other courses that I'm teaching is that we have a lot of text data.

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: _And the data is everywhere

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: you must have been experiencing this growth.

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: Just think about how much text data you're dealing with every day.

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: _I listed some data types here

text: _example
column6: on the internet we see a lot of web pages

text: _And then we have block articles

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: _emails

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: _maybe a lot of tweets are being written
column6: and a lot of emails are

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: _So
column6: the amount of text data is beyond our capacity to understand them. _

name: 1 - 1 - Course Welcome (00-03-11).srt
text: _Also
